entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023
